detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, patch front pockets and back pockets.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Long dress in an airy, crinkled cotton and silk weave with a V-shaped opening with ties at the top and long, voluminous raglan sleeves with a small opening and covered button at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a drawstring that can be pulled from the sides, and a large flounce at the front that continues down the sides for added width. Flared, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Slip-on trainers with an elastic gore at the front. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a gathered yoke at the back and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Boxy jumper in a fine knit with a soft brushed finish. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.
Sleeveless blouse in a patterned weave with a small opening and button at the back and frills front and back. Lined.
Leggings in cotton jersey with concealed elastication and a sewn-on bow at the waist and a frill detail down the legs.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped edges.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbed neckline.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a lace top, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a detachable tie belt at the waist and wide legs with creases.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Set with a strappy top, top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Strappy top with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Top with short sleeves. Both with gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy. Leggings with a wide waist panel.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy weave. High waist with elasticated smocking, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Lined.
Pencil skirt in stretch cotton jersey with narrow elastication at the top. Unlined.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Fancy dress costume in jersey with a print motif on the front, a round neck and long sleeves. Matching, padded hat with a small peak and print motif on the front.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs.

Blouse in softly draping satin with a small, gathered stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the front. Covered buttons down the front, wide, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband in soft cotton. Sleeveless, A-line top in woven fabric with a flounce at the top that continues back over the shoulders, and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a decorative bow at the front and elastication at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft fleece with a zip at the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hard smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Jacket in soft cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and at the sides of the hem. Unlined.

Straight-style blouse in an airy weave with flock-print spots. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, long, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and a straight hem.

Shirt in organic cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and wide cuffs with a covered button.
Fitted, knee-length lace skirt with concealed elastication at the waist. Lined.
Bolero in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave containing some wool with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a printed front and round neckline with a narrow trim.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with contrasting colour seams, peak lapels, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves. Side pockets, a detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Top in soft jersey with a lace top layer at the front and short cap sleeves.
Short dress in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend. Round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted top in airy, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the top and long sleeves.
Waist-high briefs in jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Trousers in sturdy jersey crêpe with a slight sheen and a wide jersey waistband for a comfortable fit. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, sewn-in creases and a gentle flare to the hem.
Waist-high briefs in jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
One metal chain bracelet with a round pendant and one bracelet with pearly plastic beads. Adjustable length.
Short skirt in a sequined weave with a concealed zip at the back. Satin lining.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in airy linen jersey. Deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail.
Short, padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the sides of the hem. Lined.
Satin-covered Alice band decorated with tulle and fabric roses.
Short dungaree dress in cotton corduroy with adjustable straps with a metal fastener, a chest pocket, fake front pockets and concealed zip in one side.
Hat in soft, jacquard-knit cotton in the shape of a strawberry with a tiny stalk at the top.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains, one with a coin-shaped pendant and the other with plastic beads. Adjustable length 46-52 cm.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Can be worn as an off-the-shoulder top.
Tunic in soft, gently draping silk with a collar, smocked section around the neckline and buttons down the front. Long, slightly wider raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Hairband in patterned jersey.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, flap chest pockets and a rounded hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved top and dungaree dress in soft fabric. Top in cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Dungaree dress in woven fabric with an open chest pocket, concealed press-stud in one side and straps with adjustable buttoning.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, button placket and long sleeves.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Double-layered yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Kimono in patterned satin with short, side sleeves, front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

KATE MORGAN x H&M. Sleeveless top in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a gathered neckline. Narrow shoulder straps with flounces that have a scalloped contrasting colour trim that meet at the back and finish in a decorative bow. Elastication at the top of the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Dungaree shorts in washed denim with worn details and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, a coin pocket, side and back pockets and buttons at the sides. Short legs with sewn-in turn-ups and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a flounce at the front that continues along the sleeves.
Tunic in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed button placket and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fancy dress costume in jersey with a glow-in-the-dark print. Long-sleeved top. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with lacing at the front and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Wide, long-sleeved blouse in a cotton poplin blend with a small collar and opening with a button at the top. Gathered seam at the top and narrow cuffs with covered buttons and a flared frill. Longer at the back.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Shorter blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and ties at the hem. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Top in stretch jersey made from a modal blend with shoulder straps and a double layer at the top.

Straight-cut blouse in satin with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke with forward-facing shoulder seams and a seam with pleats at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned, double-layered cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
